titles.title: A resolution to refer S.1964 entitled "For the Relief of Nebraska Aluminum Casting, Inc. of Hastings, Nebraska" to the Chief Judge of the United States Claims Court for a report thereon.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 10/19/1988--Introduced. Refers S. 1964, a bill for the relief of a named corporation, to the chief judge of the United States Claims Court.
